titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Program for Humanities in Medicine, School of Medicine, Yale University, Records of Howard M. Spiro as Director
Program for Humanities in Medicine, School of Medicine, Yale University, Records of Howard M. Spiro as Director
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 08:37

did.unittitle: Program for Humanities in Medicine, School of Medicine, Yale University, records of Howard M. Spiro as director

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of administrative files, correspondence, and writings documenting the Program for the Humanities in Medicine at the Yale School of Medicine.

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Yale University. Program for Humanities in Medicine

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 27-E (YRG 27-E), Records of departments, offices, programs, and projects of the Yale School of Medicine.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is restricted. See Collection Contents for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Program for Humanities in Medicine, School of Medicine, Yale University, Records of Howard M. Spiro as Director (RU 313). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The Program for Humanities in Medicine, Yale School of Medicine, was established by Dr. Howard M. Spiro in 1983 to foster an awareness of the links between the humanities and the arts and the practice of medicine.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of administrative files, correspondence, and writings documenting the Program for the Humanities in Medicine at the Yale School of Medicine.
